title: Senior Content Writer — Full-Time — 20+ Benefits & Growth Opportunities
job_overview:
As a Senior Content Writer, you will be instrumental in shaping our digital presence and refining our communication strategies. You will be responsible for creating compelling, accurate, and impactful content that helps injured victims understand their legal rights and options. This role requires a creative thinker who can turn complex ideas into clear, reader-accessible content.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and produce high-quality content for landing pages, blogs, news articles, and other web-based formats.
Conduct thorough research to ensure the accuracy and relevance of content.
Edit and proofread content to maintain high grammar, punctuation, and style standards.
Ensure all content reflects the firm's voice, tone, and brand guidelines.
Apply SEO best practices to boost content visibility and search engine rankings.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure content meets the firm’s objectives and audience needs.

Qualifications And Skills:
Minimum of 2 years of experience in content writing, preferably in the legal, healthcare, or real estate industries
Exceptional writing and editing skills, with a keen attention to detail
Passion for creating content that resonates with our audience
Strong portfolio of published works demonstrating writing and editing capabilities
Proven capability to break down complex information into clear, concise, and engaging content
Ability to adapt writing style to suit different purposes
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Ability to collaborate effectively with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
Demonstrated ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and thrive under tight deadlines in a dynamic environment
Proficient in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace

Basic Requirements:
Device Specifications: Intel i5 processor or higher with a minimum of 8GB RAM
Equipment: Webcam, speakers, and a microphone or headphones
Internet Speed: Minimum of 100Mbps with a backup connection in case of outages

Work Details:
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time | Tuesday to Saturday, 12 AM to 8:30 AM Manila Time
Location: Anywhere in the Philippines

Why Join Us?
Stable employment
Competitive salary
Bi-monthly salary
A-Z benefits, including bonuses and annual raises
Work-life balance 
Work-from-home opportunity

The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet.
